content.prompt: Suppose an economy is operating above full employment. Which of the following fiscal policy actions and resulting changes in aggregate demand will move the economy back towards full employment?

choices.label: Increasing government spending, which will shift the AD curve rightward.
Decreasing government spending, which will shift the AD curve rightward.
Increasing taxes, which will shift the AD curve leftward.
Decreasing taxes, which will shift the AD curve leftward.
Increasing transfer payments, which will shift the AD curve leftward.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
